Description: Blue-green glazed composition pendant in the form of a cartouche, inscribed with the prenomen of Tutankhamun, with suspension loop above.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1891 / Illahun, Kahun and Gurob (p. 17, pl. XVII)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2008 Jul-Sep, Monaco, Grimaldi Forum, Reines de Egyptes
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
